sentence.Network_en: She developed into an excellent horsewoman.
sentence.Network_cn: 她成了一位出色的女骑手。

sentence.Network_en: The horse reared up in fear, throwing its horsewoman off.
sentence.Network_cn: 马被吓得用后腿站立起来, 把女骑手甩了下去.

sentence.Network_en: The horse kicked its fallen horsewoman about the head.
sentence.Network_cn: 女骑手摔在地上,马朝她的头上乱踢.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(66) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... horsewhip 马鞭 horsewoman 女骑士 horsey 马的.

entry.tran: 骑马的女人;女骑手;女骑师
entry.def: A horsewoman is a woman who is riding a horse, or who rides horses well.

example.ex: She developed into an excellent horsewoman.
example.tran: 她成了一位出色的女骑手。

auth_sentence.content: One of the most moving letters I have ever received came from an accomplished horsewoman, who believed my column saved her life.
auth_sentence.res_content: One of the most moving letters I have ever received came from an accomplished horsewoman, who believed my column saved her life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One of the most moving letters I have ever received came from an accomplished horsewoman, who believed my column saved her life.

sentences.cn: 全速疾驰而来的女骑手

sentences.en: The branch of a tree knocked one of the horsewomen senseless.
sentences.cn: 一根树枝撞得一名女骑手昏了过去。

sentences.en: The horse came to a dead stop and threw its horsewoman over the gate.
sentences.cn: 那匹马突然停了下来,结果把女骑手摔出了大门。

sentences.en: The horse kicked its fallen horsewoman about the head.
sentences.cn: 女骑手摔在地上,马朝她的头上乱踢。

sentences.en: The horse reared up in fear,throwing its horsewoman off.
sentences.cn: 马被吓得用后腿站立起来,把女骑手甩了下去。
